mvMxJMdsnyqJ6ZbD3.name: Sympathy
mvMxJMdsnyqJ6ZbD3.notes: Death of one party reduces the other to 0 HP

m_SfYd0653-TWEiH1.name: Sympathy
m_SfYd0653-TWEiH1.notes: Death of one party reduces the other to 0 HP and wounds affect ally but not you

mjH1YE20h1o9yx5qA.name: Sympathy
mjH1YE20h1o9yx5qA.notes: Death of one party kills the other

m-efJ3uMZdHAKw9Lv.name: Sympathy
m-efJ3uMZdHAKw9Lv.notes: Death of one party kills the other and wounds affect ally but not you

features.situation: from those attracted to members of your sex, +2 from everyone else
from those attracted to members of your sex, +2 from everyone else

mc64PJSjt0bVvd0PN.name: Off-the-Shelf Looks
mc64PJSjt0bVvd0PN.notes: Halves the usual reaction bonus - adjust manually

features.situation: from those attracted to members of your sex, +2 from everyone else. Exception: Members of the same sex with reason to dislike you (more than -4 in reaction penalties regardless of bonuses) resent your good looks and react at -2 instead.

from those attracted to members of your sex, +2 from everyone else. Exception: Members of the same sex with reason to dislike you (more than -4 in reaction penalties regardless of bonuses) resent your good looks and react at -2 instead.

from those attracted to members of your sex, +2 from everyone else. Exception: Members of the same sex with reason to dislike you (more than -4 in reaction penalties regardless of bonuses) resent your good looks and react at -2 instead.
from sapient being with whom you actively interact (converse, lecture, etc.)

m7KQV1L3glLb_4KtB.name: Can obtain information using supernatural talents

mTosgMltK_EMyazM0.name: Can obtain information using supernatural talents

tMjVCpQ0dh6hKFxbm.name: Cultural Familiarity (any)
tMjVCpQ0dh6hKFxbm.notes: Do not suffer the normal -3 penalty for unfamiliarity

t4mgpuVaTzAyScrJZ.name: Cultural Familiarity (any)
t4mgpuVaTzAyScrJZ.notes: Do not suffer the normal -3 penalty for unfamiliarity

features.situation: to trained Acting skill for the sole purpose of "acting innocent"

msPK4nhVCbZjrlSxs.name: People Affected
msPK4nhVCbZjrlSxs.notes: Almost everyone except @large class of people@

mYeHNKsApGWPgIO3b.name: Narrow Clearance on a "Need to Know" Basis

mDWIo7bXeYsPixEIc.name: Broad Clearance on a "Need to Know" Basis

tNaGG0R0g-JdHosdf.name: Social Chameleon
tNaGG0R0g-JdHosdf.notes: Exempt from reaction penalties due to differences in Rank or Status

features.situation: from those who demand respect in situations where there would be no penalties due to differences in Rank or Status
from con artists, politicians, salesmen, etc. – but only if you aren’t trying to manipulate them.

t1rz2Xz0CzJVbJHD0.name: Acrophobia (Heights)
t1rz2Xz0CzJVbJHD0.notes: You may not voluntarily go more than 15 feet above ground, unless you are inside a building and away from windows. If there is some chance of an actual fall, self-control rolls are at -5.

ty1vftV3wYuDFyGDf.name: Agoraphobia (Open Spaces)
ty1vftV3wYuDFyGDf.notes: You are uncomfortable whenever you are outside, and actually become frightened when there are no walls within 50 feet.

txDBlmdXOWkUim6g6.name: Aichmophobia/TL5- (Sharp Things)
txDBlmdXOWkUim6g6.notes: You are afraid of anything pointed. Swords, spears, knives, and needles all give you fits. Trying to use a sharp weapon, or being threatened with one, requires a self-control roll at -2.

ta1rQjEAuHIxKMLTX.name: Aichmophobia/TL6+ (Sharp Things)
ta1rQjEAuHIxKMLTX.notes: You are afraid of anything pointed. Swords, spears, knives, and needles all give you fits. Trying to use a sharp weapon, or being threatened with one, requires a self-control roll at -2.

tTwdyCFvg13epx9Sx.name: Ailurophobia (Cats)
tTwdyCFvg13epx9Sx.notes: This includes all felines: lions, tigers, panthers, etc.

tKg6mJcJRVnqrphwP.name: Autophobia (Being Alone)
tKg6mJcJRVnqrphwP.notes: You cannot stand to be alone, and do anything in your power to avoid it.

tT0t9mmOQVZip7vh1.name: Brontophobia (Loud Noises)
tT0t9mmOQVZip7vh1.notes: You avoid any situation where loud noises are likely. A sudden loud noise requires an immediate self-control roll. A thunderstorm is a traumatic experience for you!

tb72VyBL476BG-jQ-.name: Claustrophobia (Enclosed Spaces)
tb72VyBL476BG-jQ-.notes: You are uncomfortable any time you can’t see the sky – or at least a very high ceiling. In a small room or vehicle, you feel the walls closing in on you... You need air! This is a dangerous fear for someone who plans to go underground.

ttyPjcofZJGT5EYO8.name: Coitophobia (Sex)
ttyPjcofZJGT5EYO8.notes: You are terrified by the idea of sexual relations or the loss of your virginity.

t3hlfb89At7cJnW-b.name: Cynophobia (Dogs)
t3hlfb89At7cJnW-b.notes: This includes all canines: foxes, wolves, coyotes, wild dogs, etc.

tVFBTOSZXNKEszmE_.name: Demophobia (Crowds)
tVFBTOSZXNKEszmE_.notes: Any group of over a dozen people sets off this fear unless they are all well known to you. The self-control roll is at -1 for over 25 people, -2 for a crowd of 100 or more, -3 for 1,000, -4 for 10,000, and so on.

tFBbekVSX1S2TG0l3.name: Entomophobia (Insects)
tFBbekVSX1S2TG0l3.notes: You are afraid of all “bugs.” Large or poisonous ones give -3 to self-control rolls. Very large ones, or large numbers, give -6. Avoid hills of giant ants.

tSCqWrALTZi6pqBUH.name: Gluttony
tSCqWrALTZi6pqBUH.notes: Make a self-control roll when presented with a tempting morsel or good wine that, for some reason, you should resist. If you fail, you partake – regardless of the consequences.

tVmxJaEPGyBvrDPPT.name: Greed
tVmxJaEPGyBvrDPPT.notes: Make a self-control roll any time riches are offered – as payment for fair work, gains from adventure, spoils of crime, or just bait. If you fail, you do whatever it takes to get the payoff.

features.situation: on any task that requires creativity or invention, including most rolls against Artist skill, all Engineer rolls for new inventions, and all skill rolls made to use the Gadgeteer advantage

tMLrUiiCH7HI_vmj6.name: Hemophobia (Blood)
tMLrUiiCH7HI_vmj6.notes: The sight of blood gives you the screaming willies! You need to make a self-control roll during most combats...

tzDw-aOM5Czqpx4e1.name: Herpetophobia (Reptiles)
tzDw-aOM5Czqpx4e1.notes: You come unglued at the thought of reptiles, amphibians, and similar scaly slimies. A very large reptile, or a poisonous one, gives -2 to self-control rolls; a horde of reptiles (such as a snake pit) gives -4.

tvsGgTdyT9qmsADRZ.name: Hoplophobia (Weapons)
tvsGgTdyT9qmsADRZ.notes: The presence of any sort of weaponry is stressful. Trying to use a weapon, or being threatened with one, requires a self-control roll at -2.

t2huE_t6RtFyQVXEt.name: Incurious
t2huE_t6RtFyQVXEt.notes: Make a self-control roll when confronted with something strange. If you fail, you ignore it!

features.situation: from victims of your intolerance (may be as much as -5, at GM's discretion)
toward those you are jealous of (may be as much as -4, at GM's discretion)

t27z8ZhkP-tqtPpde.name: Lecherousness
t27z8ZhkP-tqtPpde.notes: Make a self-control roll whenever you have more than the briefest contact with an appealing member of the sex you find attractive, at -5 if this person is Handsome/Beautiful, or at -10 if Very Handsome/Very Beautiful. If you fail, you must make a “pass” using whatever wiles and skills you can bring to bear.

tp7FbtoRslyNHnxBp.name: Low Pain Threshold
tp7FbtoRslyNHnxBp.notes: Double the shock from any injury. Whenever you take a wound that does more than 1 HP of damage, you must make a Will roll to avoid crying out.

features.situation: to resist knockdown, stunning, and physical torture

ttTFRiF6vQKBSsQtx.name: Manaphobia (Magic)
ttTFRiF6vQKBSsQtx.notes: You can never learn to use magic, and you react badly to any user of magic. Make a self-control roll whenever you are in the presence of magic. This roll is at -3 if you are to be the target of friendly magic, and -6 if you are the target of hostile magic. (The magic does not have to be real, if you believe in it!)

tx3a4KNbpoi9anoHd.name: Mysophobia (Dirt)
tx3a4KNbpoi9anoHd.notes: You are deathly afraid of infection, or just of dirt and filth. Make a self-control roll when you must do something that might get you dirty. Roll at -5 to eat any unaccustomed food. You should act as “finicky” as possible.

t2HX6RZPoMltYsWmq.name: Necrophobia (Death)
t2HX6RZPoMltYsWmq.notes: You are terrified by the idea of death. Make a self-control roll in the presence of any dead body (animals don’t count, but portions of human bodies do). Roll at -4 if the body is that of someone you know, or -6 if the body is unnaturally animated in some way. A ghost (or apparent ghost) also requires a roll at -6.

tOgapeqcxGQbcdS7n.name: Overconfidence
tOgapeqcxGQbcdS7n.notes: You must make a self-control roll any time the GM feels you show an unreasonable degree of caution. If you fail, you must go ahead as though you were able to handle the situation!

features.situation: from young or naive individuals who believe you are as good as you say you are

tc_nIASuOY4vFjed6.name: Post-Combat Shakes
tc_nIASuOY4vFjed6.notes: Make a self-control roll at the end of any battle. If you fail, roll 3d, add the amount by which you failed your self-control roll, and look up the result on the Fright Check Table.

tVxneRu0cXQpmhkis.name: Pyrophobia (Fire)
tVxneRu0cXQpmhkis.notes: Even a burning cigarette bothers you if it comes within five yards.

thW030dDbC1vA5kpw.name: Post-Combat Shakes
thW030dDbC1vA5kpw.notes: Make a self-control roll at the end of any battle. If you fail, roll 3d, add the amount by which you failed your self-control roll, and look up the result on the Fright Check Table.

mEKCB9ncDTeoSqdfB.name: People Affected
mEKCB9ncDTeoSqdfB.notes: Almost everyone except @large class of people@

tvdbD4l6Lhx06d-uN.name: Scotophobia (Darkness)
tvdbD4l6Lhx06d-uN.notes: A common fear, but crippling. You should avoid being underground if possible; if something happens to your flashlight or torch, you might well lose your mind before you can relight it.

tJIBqoyNXXnQ4WdLb.name: Selfish
tJIBqoyNXXnQ4WdLb.notes: Make a self-control roll whenever you experience a clear social slight or “snub.” On a failure, you lash out at the offending party just as if you had Bad Temper.

features.situation: from others when your Selfishness surfaces

t_cwBRk5_FqLw6aRi.name: Teratophobia (Monsters)
t_cwBRk5_FqLw6aRi.notes: Any “unnatural” creature sets off this fear. You have -1 to -4 on the self-control roll if the monster seems very large or dangerous, or if there are a lot of them. Note that the definition of “monster” depends on experience. An American Indian would consider an elephant monstrous, while an African pygmy would not!

tCDIckXIMjICEA-sH.name: Thalassophobia (Oceans)
tCDIckXIMjICEA-sH.notes: You are afraid of any large body of water. Ocean travel, or even air travel over the ocean, is basically impossible for you, and encounters with aquatic monsters are also upsetting.

tyGiRI-jgPuKGS8w_.name: Triskaidekaphobia (Number 13)
tyGiRI-jgPuKGS8w_.notes: You must make a self-control roll whenever you have to deal with the number 13. Roll at -5 if Friday the 13th is involved!

tXvBvdTgRF-656wSD.name: Unfit
tXvBvdTgRF-656wSD.notes: You lose FP at twice the normal rate

features.situation: to all HT rolls to remain conscious, avoid death, resist disease or poison, etc

t8AWMG8QsFJyZaSGD.name: Unluckiness
t8AWMG8QsFJyZaSGD.notes: Once per play session, the GM will arbitrarily and maliciously make something go wrong for you.

tUDzkoiYPyJef6l4v.name: Very Unfit
tUDzkoiYPyJef6l4v.notes: You lose FP at twice the normal rate and recover FP at only half the normal rate

features.situation: -2 to all HT rolls to remain conscious, avoid death, resist disease or poison, etc.

tfQNUJ2h_DsezT06S.name: Xenophobia (Strange and Unknown Things)
tfQNUJ2h_DsezT06S.notes: You are upset by any sort of strange circumstances, and in particular by strange people. Make a self-control roll when surrounded by people of another race or nationality; roll at -3 if the people are not human. If you lose control, you might well attack strangers out of fear.

SGDIX4MwLR0LfU-gc.name: 3 extra points in primary or secondary skills
